item.description:
From 7 to 9 pm, the FNX Snoriders will be at Smokey Bones in Tyngsboro having a warm up party to promote their first event at Wildcat this coming weekend. They usually give away prizes and lift tickets for the coming weekend, so a bunch of us will be heading out to get ready for the weekend, meet other skiers and boarders and maybe get a free lift ticket for Wildcat this weekend. We won lots of tickets at the FNX events in years past so this promises to be a good time.

http://www.smokeybone...

I will send my phone number to those who RSVP for the meetup.

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be wearing Brettl gear
item.name: FNX Snoriders Warmup Party for Wildcat, January 7, 2010
